duties_responsibilities.duty: Train and supervise Package Handlers and Clerks on safety, productivity, and various job-related tasks.
Facilitate training with new and current employees.
Conduct and participate in group meetings.
Supervise daily activities of package handlers and clerks to ensure all assigned duties are accomplished safely and timely.
Understand and consistently demonstrate UPS's high ethical standards and code of conduct.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or International equivalent - Preferred
